unnormalised: Secondly, be aware of the local customs and traditions. When visiting temples like the Golden Temple in Amritsar or the Meenakshi Temple in Madurai, remember to dress modestly. Covering your head is often required. Also, "prasad" or blessed food, is usually offered. Accepting it with respect is considered good etiquette. Consider hiring a local guide, it usually costs around Rs. 500-1000 per day, but they can provide valuable insights.

unnormalised: Finally, prioritize your health and safety. Carry essential medicines and a first-aid kit. Stay hydrated, especially in warmer regions. Be mindful of your belongings and avoid travelling alone in isolated areas. You should also register your trip with the local authorities, which is often a req when visiting sensitive areas near the border. Safe travels and may your journey be fulfilling!
